          <h2>
           How do I find schools that offer the program and degree I want?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17794466">
          <div id="boxatt17794466" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20904042">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             </li>

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate program catalogs?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17794467">
          <div id="boxatt17794467" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20904071">
              <a id="link_20904071" href="http://www.clas.ufl.edu/CLAS/american-universities.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20904071,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20904071}); ">
               American Universities
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to home pages U.S. universities, which in turn link to available graduate programs and their catalogs.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24917949">
              <a id="link_24917949" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24917949,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24917949}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google: graduate school catalog [name of school]
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate external sources of funding?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17794471">
          <div id="boxatt17794471" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20903409">
              <a id="link_20903409" href="http://www.gradschool.cornell.edu/fellowships" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20903409,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20903409}); ">
               Cornell University Graduate School Fellowships Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search by keyword, or limit by discipline or demographic.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904501">
              Dollars for College
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.3025 O52d. The Quick Guide to funding for both graduate and undergraduate study, one volume for each discipline represented.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22986561">
              <a id="link_22986561" href="https://researchfunding.duke.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22986561,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22986561}); ">
               Duke University Graduate Student Opportunities
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The advanced search mode allows limit by discipline.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904580">
              Financial Aid for Study and Training Abroad
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.35 F491s. Combined index: country and level of study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904524">
              The Graduate Student’s Complete Scholarship Book
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.34 G738s. Brief but diverse entries. Most areas of study are included. Includes career/major index.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904570">
              The Grants Register Complete Guide to Postgraduate Funding Worldwide
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.34 G764r. Funding from foundations for graduate and postdoctoral study abroad.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904510">
              Money for Graduate Studies in . . . [varied disciplines]
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.3025 M742. A separate volume each for Biological and Health Sciences, Physical and Earth Sciences, Social and Behavioral Sciences, and the Humanities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20903846">
              <a id="link_20903846" href="http://staff.lib.msu.edu/harris23/grants/3gradinf.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20903846,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20903846}); ">
               MSU Libraries Graduate Fellowships and Loans
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to various lists of financial aid sources, or to websites of funders themselves.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904533">
              Peterson’s Grants for Graduate &amp; Postdoctoral Study
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.3025 P443g. Details on 1,400 fellowships, scholarships, grants, awards, and prizes from American sources for study in the U.S. and abroad.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20904548">
              Scholarships, Fellowships, and Loans
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library Graduate Ref Collection call # 378.33 S368f. A compendium of funding sources at both the undergraduate and graduate levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22986567">
              <a id="link_22986567" href="https://grad.ucla.edu/asis/grapes/search.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22986567,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22986567}); ">
               University of California GRAPES Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search of 540 private and publicly funded awards.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22986579">
              <a id="link_22986579" href="https://www.grad.illinois.edu/fellowship/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22986579,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22986579}); ">
               University of Illinois Graduate College Fellowship Opportunities
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Arranged in broad categories, such as humanities/social science.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22982412">
              <a id="link_22982412" href="http://baileydemofundingportal.web.unc.edu/funding-databases/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22982412,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22982412}); ">
               UNC Funding Portal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A well-organized site. Muhlenberg does not have access to the subscription sites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20903395">
              <a id="link_20903395" href="https://yale.communityforce.com/Funds/Search.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20903395,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Researching Graduate Schools and Finding Money to Attend', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20903395}); ">
               Yale Graduate School Fellowship Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Select your field of study, citizenship status and the type of award you are seeking.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4818022" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17794472">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17794472">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17794472">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Muhlenberg College Prestigious Awards Initiative
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17794472">
          <p>
           Since its inception,the&nbsp;
           <em>
            Prestigious Awards Initiative
           </em>
           , supported by the Dean of Academic Life, has resulted in over one hundred-twenty awards for students and recent graduates, including two Truman, twenty-three Fulbrights, and nineteen NSFs. With these grants, students have pursued studies at Princeton, Harvard, Brown, Vanderbilt, the University of Wisconsin, and universities overseas. For more information, visit the Dean of Academic Life
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/dean-academic/awards/world/why_apply.html">
            website.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17794472" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
